Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: First Ill start by going through each event one by one and see if I can spot any patterns or connections Ill note down the key details for each event especially focusing on patient age and gender

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: Event 4 Initial triage in ER same patient as event 1 Because age and gender match Triage code 3 Event 5 Initial triage in ER same patient as event 2 Age 62 female triage code 2 Event 6 Doctor consultation in Surgery male 28 scheduled knee surgery Probably the same as event 3

Name: Inductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Now Ill try to group these events based on patient details and the flow of activities Patient A Male 45 ER Events 1 4 7 12 15 Registered triaged xray consultation discharged Patient B Female 62 ER Events 2 5 8 10 11 14 17 Registered triaged lab tests consultation prescription discharged Patient C Male 28 Surgery Events 3 6 9 13 16 18 Registered consultation surgery prep surgery performed recovery discharged

Name: Validation - PE
Text: I think this makes sense because each patients events follow a logical flow from registration through to discharge with their details matching across events Each case is distinct based on the patients age and gender and the sequence of activities in each department
